attributes.action: reward all Civil Servants with an extra 2.3% pay award
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the Bank of England's decision to raise the Interest Rate to 5.5% (it's highest level for 4 years) and the steady rise in Council Tax and other household Bills, we, the Undersigned call upon the Prime Minister to announce an extra pay award to all Civil Servants of 2.3% for 2007, and a pay award of an extra 3% in 2008.
